updateElements.mainHeader: Sydney Catholic Schools - Critical macOS Update
updateElements.subHeader: Your Operating System version is no longer supported.
updateElements.mainContentHeader: Warning: Your device will restart multiple times during this update.
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that we can accurately protect your device.

The deadline for this upgrade is 30th November 2024. You can defer up to 10 times or until the deadline is reached, at which point you will not be able to access your computer until your device is upgraded.

If you have any questions or concerns please contact ITS Service Desk:
Email: its.servicedesk@syd.catholic.edu.au
Phone: 02 9568 8279

To upgrade immediatly click the blue 'Update Now' buttton above, or to postpone until later time click the 'Defer' drop down below.
